data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Arsenal get the game underway.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Andre Marriner signals a Everton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 4, Everton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 8, Arsenal needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Goodison Park.
Andre Marriner awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Everton's area.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Everton.
Everton's Michael Keane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, At Goodison Park, Mohamed Elneny has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Rob Holding scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 1-0 at Goodison Park.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in Liverpool.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Edward Nketiah for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
In the minute 27, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 30, Important block from the Arsenal defence as Alex Iwobi fires in a strike for Everton.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 33, Arsenal have been given a penalty at Goodison Park...
Nicolas Pepe levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Andre Marriner signals a Everton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 37, Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Arsenal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Everton.
Kieran Tierney (Arsenal) gets a yellow card.
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, In Liverpool Everton attack through Gylfi Sigurdsson. The finish is off target, however.
Andre Marriner awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Liverpool, Edward Nketiah of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Everton drives forward and Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 45, At Goodison Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Andre Marriner blows to end the first-half.
Everton's Yerry Mina scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
Gylfi Sigurdsson with an assist there.
The second-half has commenced. Everton with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Everton drive forward but Richarlison is judged offside.
Everton have a goal kick.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Arsenal.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 54, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
David Luiz (Arsenal) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 58, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Everton.
In the minute 62, Everton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
Mikel Arteta is making the team's first substitution at Goodison Park with Joseph Willock replacing Mohamed Elneny.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Everton.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
Arsenal's Nicolas Pepe misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, Andre Marriner awards Everton a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, Gabriel Martinelli is replacing Nicolas Pepe for Arsenal at Goodison Park.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Willian of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Everton have a goal kick.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
In the minute 76, Alexandre Lacazette is on a sub for Edward Nketiah for Arsenal.
Free kick Everton.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 81, Everton push forward at Goodison Park and Alex Iwobi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal defence.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Mason Holgate (Everton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 82, Andre Marriner awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a first substitution, with Seamus Coleman replacing Alex Iwobi.
Arsenal's Gabriel Martinelli breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Everton defender.
Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Everton's area.
In the minute 87, Joseph Willock's header is off-target for Arsenal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 89, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andre Marriner signals a Everton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Arsenal drive upfield and Bukayo Saka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Everton defender.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Joseph Willock (Arsenal) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Richarlison with Jonjoe Kenny. This is the second substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin for Everton has been booked by Andre Marriner and receives a first yellow card.
Everton make their third substitution with Cenk Tosun replacing Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
